a0.speaker: Jane:
a0.dialogue: Hey! You're the same person who caused all the fuss earlier on! Can you just get lost?

a1.speaker: Reimu:
a1.dialogue: I won't! Based on what's happening lately, I know who the main culprit is...

a2.speaker: Reimu:
a2.dialogue: It must be a person I've met before! I will make it to the end and expose the culprit!
